title.native: PERSONA3 THE MOVIE —#2 Midsummer Knight's Dream—
title.romaji: PERSONA 3 THE MOVIE: #2 Midsummer Knight's Dream
title.english: Persona 3 the Movie: #2 Midsummer Knight's Dream

description: After realizing the value of life and the importance of his own allies, Makoto finally got his smile back. He finds himself learning more about those comrades and getting closer to them. Makoto wishes that everything will continue just as they are. However, little by little, the pieces and people in Makoto's new, happy life begin to fall apart.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.description: Prominently features mythological elements, especially those from religious or cultural tradition.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

title.native: PERSONA3 THE MOVIE —#1 Spring of Birth—

node.description:
Music composer of many Atlus videogame titles, he joined the company in 1995.

He left Atlus in September of 2021.
Currently works at Atlus. Main character designer for Persona 3 onwards.

ATLUS (株式会社アトラス Kabushiki-gaisha Atorasu) is a Japanese computer and video game developer, publisher, and distributor based in Tokyo, Japan, best known for developing the role-playing video game franchise Megami Tensei and the surgical simulation/visual novel franchise Trauma Center.  (Source: Wikipedia)

name.native: シンディ・H・ヤマウチ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/49521465) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?id=8180930) | [Website](http://animestylepro.com/index.html)

Originating from Studio Musashi. She aspired to become an animator because of [Shingo Araki](https://anilist.co/staff/102613/).

She is fluent in English.
